title: Occasional Loss of Control
body: For about a week now, every few minutes I'll lose control of my character for anywhere from 2-5 seconds. My ping doesn't change, I'm certain it has nothing to do with my internet, and my fps doesn't change. Everything in the game acts normal except my loss of control. It's not my keyboard or mouse because this is the only game it happens in, and I'm still able to do everything fine except control my character. I've ran a repair already and it's changed nothing. I honestly have no clue what it could be.

replies.body:
This often happens as a result of bursts of [*packet loss*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Packet_loss) or *high packet buffering*. Most of the time, these issues occur inside your network or along your route to our servers. I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first, to ensure your local settings are good to go.

Let me know if you experience these issues again after working through those steps.
